AccountAccountRelation.name: AccountAccountRelation
AccountAccountRelation.description: Represents a relationship between accounts, such as a relationship between a          dealer account and a household account.

AccountId.description: ID of the account associated with this account account                       relationship.

EndDate.description: The date when the relationship ends.

HierarchyType.description: Specifies the hierarchy between accounts that are related.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the account is actively involved with the                       related account (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view.

Name.description: Name of the account account relationship.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

RelatedAccountId.description: The related account in the relationship.

RelatedInverseRecordId.description: The record that specifies the inverse relationship between the                       accounts.

StartDate.description: The date when the relationship starts.

ApiName.description: The API name of an actionable event orchestration record.

ContextDefinitionId.description: The context definition related to the expression set that                       processes an actionable event.

ContextDefinitionName.description: The name of a context definition that's associated with the                       actionable event orchestration.

ContextMappingId.description: The context mapping that processes an actionable event.

ContextMappingName.description: The name of a context mapping in the context definition that's                       associated with the actionable event orchestration.

DefinitionId.description: The unique identifier of the actionable event orchestration's                       definition.

EventCategory.description: The category of an actionable event.

EventSubtypeId.description: The subtype of an actionable event.

EventTypeId.description: The type of an actionable event.

ExecutionProcedureId.description: The expression set or flow definition that executes the                       orchestration.

ExecutionProcedureName.description: The name of the flow definition or the expression set template                       that executes the orchestration.

ExecutionProcedureType.description: Specifies the type of automated procedure that executes the                       orchestration.

IsActive.description: Specifies if an actionable event orchestration record is active                       (true) or not (false).

IsInstalledTemplate.description: Indicates whether the actionable event orchestration is an                       installed template that can't be modified (true) or not                       (false).

IsTemplate.description: Indicates whether the actionable event orchestration is a template                       (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the associated location was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the associated location was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of an actionable event orchestration record.

OwnerId.description: The owner ID of an actionable event orchestration record.

UsageType.description: The usage type of the event orchestration.

ActionableEventSubtype.name: ActionableEventSubtype
ActionableEventSubtype.description: Represents the subtype of an external or internal event that's processed by          the Actionable Event Orchestration framework to trigger different types of actions.

ActionableEventTypeId.description: The parent event type related to an actionable event subtype.

ApiName.description: The API name of an actionable event sub type.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the associated location was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the associated location was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of an event subtype that represents a specific external                       or internal actionable event.

ActionableEventType.name: ActionableEventType
ActionableEventType.description: Represents the type of an external or internal event that's processed by the          Actionable Event Orchestration framework to trigger different types of actions.

ApiName.description: The API name of an actionable event type.

DefinitionId.description: The unique identifier of the actionable event type's                       definition.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the associated location was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the associated location was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of an event type that represents a specific external or                       internal actionable event type.

OwnerId.description: The owner ID of an event type that represents a specific  external                       or internal actionable event type.

ActionableEventTypeDef.name: ActionableEventTypeDef
ActionableEventTypeDef.description: Represents the definition of an actionable event type so that the records can          be migrated from one org to another.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name of the actionable event type definition.

FullName.description: The name of the actionable event type definition.

Language.description: The language in which this actionable event type definition is                       created.

MasterLabel.description: Label of the actionable event type definition.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix associated with this object. Each Developer                       Edition organization that creates a managed package has a unique                       namespace prefix. Limit: 15 characters. You can refer to a                       component in a managed package by using the namespacePrefix__componentName                          notation.The namespace prefix can have one of the following                          values:                           In Developer Edition organizations, the namespace prefix is                             set to the namespace prefix of the organization for all                             objects that support it. There’s an exception if an object is                             in an installed managed package. In that case, the object has                             the namespace prefix of the installed managed package. This                             field’s value is the namespace prefix of the Developer                             Edition organization of the package developer.                           In organizations that aren’t Developer Edition                             organizations, NamespacePrefix is only                             set for objects that are part of an installed managed                             package. There’s no namespace prefix for all other                             objects.

ActionableOrchResponseEvent.name: ActionableOrchResponseEvent
ActionableOrchResponseEvent.description: Represents information about an internal or external event after actions are          taken by the orchestration process and the response is recorded.

ActionableOrchSourceEvent.description: The actionable source event related to the response event.

ErrorInformation.description: The error codes and error messages related to an actionable event                       that failed to be processed.

EventUuid.description: A universal unique identifier (UUID) that identifies a platform                       event message. This field is available in API version 62.0 and                       later.

ExecutedAction.description: The details about the action taken for an actionable event as                       executed by the actionable event orchestration framework.

ProcessingStatus.description: Specifies the processing status of the actionable event for which                       the response is published.

ReplayId.description: Represents an ID value that is populated by the system and refers                       to the position of the event in the event stream. Replay ID values                       aren’t guaranteed to be contiguous for consecutive events. A                       subscriber can store a replay ID value and use it on resubscription                       to retrieve missed events that are within the retention                       window.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the event in the source system where the                       actionable event originated.

ActionableOrchSourceEvent.name: ActionableOrchSourceEvent
ActionableOrchSourceEvent.description: Represents information about an event on which actions are taken by the          orchestration process.

AdditionalCriteria.description: The additional criteria that customers want to share about an                       actionable event.

Category.description: The category of the actionable event.

EventData.description: The data about an actionable event, such as the faults, signals,                       or other input details.

EventUuid.description: A universal unique identifier (UUID) that identifies a platform                       event message. This field is available in API version 62.0 and                       later.

ReplayId.description: Represents an ID value that is populated by the system and refers                       to the position of the event in the event stream. Replay ID values                       aren’t guaranteed to be contiguous for consecutive events. A                       subscriber can store a replay ID value and use it on resubscription                       to retrieve missed events that are within the retention                       window.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of an event in the source system where the                       event originates.

Subtype.description: The subtype of the actionable event.

Type.description: The type of the actionable event.

AppraisedById.description: The contact or the user who performs an appraisal.

Comment.description: The dealer or customer provides a comment for the appraisal, such                       as instructions or context.

FinalAppraisalValue.description: The final appraisal value that sums up the total item final value                       and the total adjustment value of an appraisal.

InitiatedById.description: The account, contact, or user who initiates an appraisal.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the appraisal is active (true) or not                       (false).

OwnerId.description: The owner of the appraisal record.

PurposeType.description: Specifies the purpose of the appraisal, such as sales, trade-in,                       or valuation of an asset.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The record of an object, such as lead, account, opportunity, or                       application form product that serves as the context for the                       appraisal.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the appraisal.

TotalAdjustmentValue.description: The cumulative value based on all appraisal adjustments that refer                       to an appraisal.

TotalItemFinalValue.description: The cumulative value based on all the final values of all items                       related to the appraisal.

UsageType.description: The usage type of the appraisal.

ValidityEndDate.description: The date until which the appraisal is valid.

AdjustedById.description: The contact or the user that performs the adjustment.

AdjustmentValue.description: The positive or negative value of the appraisal adjustment.

AppraisalId.description: The appraisal record for which an adjustment is made.

AppraisalItemId.description: The appraisal item record for which an adjustment is made

Description.description: The description of the appraisal adjustment.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp indicating the last time the current user viewed a                       related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp indicating when the current user last viewed this                       record.

Name.description: The name of the appraisal adjustment.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the adjustment.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the appraisal adjustment.

Address.description: The address of the appraisal item.

AppraisalId.description: The appraisal associated with the appraisal item.

AppraisedById.description: The contact or the user that appraises the item.

ConditionType.description: Specifies the condition of the item that is appraised.

CustomerAskingValue.description: The value of the item proposed by the customer for the                       appraisal.

ExteriorColor.description: The exterior color of the item that is appraised.

FinalValue.description: The final value of the appraisal item.

IdentificationNumber.description: The identification number of the item that is appraised.

InitialValue.description: The preliminary value for the appraisal based on provider                       estimates.

InstallDate.description: The date that the item is installed.

IsAddOnIncluded.description: Indicates whether the item includes an add on (true) or not                       (false).

IsCustomized.description: Indicates whether the item is customized (true) or not                       (false).

IsHandoverComplete.description: Indicates whether the handover is complete for the appraisal item                       (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                       record.

LicensePlateNumber.description: The license plate number of the vehicle that is appraised.

MakeName.description: Specifies the make name of the item that is appraised.

ManufacturedDate.description: The date that the item is manufactured.

ModelName.description: Specifies the model of the item that is appraised.

ModelYear.description: Specifies the year when the model of the item is first                       launched.

OwnershipType.description: Specifies the type of ownership of the item.

PurchaseDate.description: The date that the item is purchased.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The existing record of the item related to the appraisal as                       referenced in the application, such as an Asset or Vehicle record                       with a serial number or a vehicle identification number.

RegistrationState.description: The state where the item that is appraised is registered.

RegistrationZipCode.description: The ZIP code of the item that is appraised.

TotalAdjustmentValue.description: The cumulative value based on all appraisal adjustments that refer                       to this appraisal item.

Trim.description: The trim levels supported by the item that is appraised.

Type.description: Specifies the type of item that forms the basis for the                       appraisal.

Usage.description: The usage of the item that is appraised.

UsageUnitOfMeasureId.description: The unit of measure for the usage.

WarrantyEndDate.description: The end date of the warranty of the item that is appraised.

AppraisalItemId.description: The appraisal item that's associated with the appraisal item                       add-on.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                       record.

Name.description: The name of the appraisal item add-on.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the appraisal item add-on.

UnitPrice.description: The unit price of the appraisal item add-on.

AppraisalItemId.description: The appraisal item that's associated with the appraisal source                       valuation.

AverageConditionValue.description: The value of the item if it's average condition.

CleanConditionValue.description: The value of the item if it's in clean condition.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                       record.

Name.description: The autopopulated name of Appraisal Item Provider Valuation                       record.

ProviderName.description: The name of the provider that gives the valuation of the                       item.

RoughConditionValue.description: The value of the item if it's in rough condition.

ValuationDateTime.description: The date and time when the source gives the valuation of the                       item.

AssessmentIndicatorDefinition.name: AssessmentIndicatorDefinition
AssessmentIndicatorDefinition.description: Define parameters or metrics that act as markers of compliance for partner          visit tasks.

DataType.description: Type of data the assessment indicator definition can hold.

Description.description: Description of the assessment indicator definition.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the assessment indicator definition that indicates the                       metric used during a task.

OwnerId.description: ID of the assessment indicator definition record owner.

AssetAccountParticipant.name: AssetAccountParticipant
AssetAccountParticipant.description: Represents a junction between the Asset and Account objects describing the          association between a participating account and an asset.

AccountId.description: The stakeholder account associated with the asset.

AssetId.description: The asset associated with the account.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date when the association between the stakeholder and the                       vehicle ended.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date when the association between the stakeholder and the                       vehicle was initiated.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the association between the stakeholder and the                       vehicle is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the asset account participant.

RecordTypeId.description: The record type associated with the asset account                       participant.

StakeholderRole.description: Specifies the role of the associated account.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type of the asset account participant.

VehicleId.description: The vehicle that's marked as an asset.

AssetContactParticipant.name: AssetContactParticipant
AssetContactParticipant.description: Represents a junction between the Asset and Contact objects describing the          association between a participating contact and an asset.

AssetId.description: The asset associated with the contact.

ContactId.description: The contact associated with the asset.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date when the association between the stakeholder and the                       vehicle ended.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date when the association between the stakeholder and the                       vehicle was initiated.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the association between the stakeholder and the                       vehicle is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the asset contact participant.

StakeholderRole.description: Specifies the role of the associated contact.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type of the asset contact participant.

VehicleId.description: The vehicle that's marked as an asset.

AssetMilestone.name: AssetMilestone
AssetMilestone.description: Represents the key events in the lifecycle of a vehicle asset, such as          manufacturing, registration, or resale.

Address.description: The address associated with the milestone.

AssetId.description: The asset record that's associated with the milestone.

City.description: The city where the milestone occurred.

Country.description: The country where the milestone occurred.

Description.description: The description of the milestone.

ExpiredDate.description: The expiration date of the milestone.

GeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates                       compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically                       provides this value based on the milestone location’s latitude and                       longitude coordinates.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Latitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the                       milestone location. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and                       90 with up to 15 decimal places.

LocationId.description: The location associated with the milestone.

Longitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the                       milestone location. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and                       180 with up to 15 decimal places.

MilestoneDate.description: The date on which the milestone occurred.

Name.description: The name of the asset milestone.

PostalCode.description: The postal code of the location where the milestone occurred.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the milestone in the external                       system.

SourceSystemName.description: The external system from where the record was imported.

Stage.description: Specifies the stage of the milestone.

StageComment.description: The comments about the stage of the milestone. For example, the                       reason for marking the milestone as tentative.

State.description: The state where the milestone occurred.

Street.description: The street where the milestone occurred.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type of the asset milestone.

VehicleId.description: The vehicle asset that's associated with the milestone.

AssetTitle.name: AssetTitle
AssetTitle.description: Represents information that establishes the legal ownership of an asset or a          vehicle.

AssetId.description: The Asset associated with the Asset Title record.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date on which the validity of the title ends.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date on which the title is issued.

FinancialAccountId.description: The active Financial Account associated with the asset or vehicle                       for the Asset Title record.

IsActive.description: Identifies whether the title is active (true) or not (false).

IssueFormat.description: Specifies the format used to issue or transfer the asset                       title.

IssuePlaceId.description: The place of issue for an asset title.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date when a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date when a user viewed this record.

LienStatus.description: Specifies the lien status of the title.

Name.description: The name of the Asset Title record.

TitleNumber.description: The unique identification number of the title.

Type.description: Specifies the type of condition of the vehicle or asset associated                       with the title.

VehicleId.description: The vehicle associated with the Asset Title record.

VehicleIdentificationNumber.description: The vehicle identification number of the vehicle associated with a                       title.

AssetTitleParty.name: AssetTitleParty
AssetTitleParty.description: Represents the relationship between an account, a contact, or a user and an          asset title.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date until when the party is associated with the asset                       title.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date from when the party is associated with the asset                       title.

IsActive.description: Identifies if the title and party relationship is active (true) or                       not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date when a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date when a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The autopopulated name of the Asset Title Party record.

PartyId.description: The party associated with the asset title. A party can be an                       account, a user, or a contact.

PartyRole.description: Specifies the role of the party associated with the asset                       title.

TitleId.description: The asset title related to the asset title party.

AssetWarranty.name: AssetWarranty
AssetWarranty.description: Defines the warranty terms applicable to an asset along with any          exclusions and extensions.

AssetId.description: The ID of the asset this asset warranty applies to.

AssetWarrantyNumber.description: The identifier of the asset warranty record.

EndDate.description: The date on which this asset warranty expires.

ExchangeType.description: The type of exchange offered by this asset warranty.

ExpensesCoveredEndDate.description: The date on which cover for expenses ends.

IsTransferable.description: Indicates whether the asset warranty can be transferred to a new                       owner (true) or not (false).

LaborCoveredEndDate.description: The date on which cover for labor ends.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the asset warranty was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the asset warranty was last viewed.

PartsCoveredEndDate.description: The date on which cover for parts ends.

Pricebook2Id.description: The price book item associated with this asset warranty term.

StartDate.description: The date on which cover under this asset warranty starts.

WarrantyTermId.description: The ID of the warranty term this asset warranty term extends.

WarrantyType.description: The type of the asset warranty.

Automotive Cloud Fields on ApplicationFo.name: Automotive Cloud Fields on ApplicationForm
Automotive Cloud Fields on ApplicationFo.description: Standard fields extend the ApplicationForm object for use in Automotive Cloud          to represent high-level information of an application that's submitted for an automotive          financial product.

IntakeChannelType.description: Specifies the type of channel through which the application form                       is received by the system.

TierType.description: Specifies the tier type of an application form, based on which the                       offer terms are evaluated.

TotalDebtToIncomePercent.description: The cumulative debt to income percentage for all applicants                       related to the application form.

TotalIncomeToExpenseRatio.description: The cumulative expense to income ratio for all applicants related                       to the application form.

TotalLoanToValuePercent.description: The cumulative loan to value percentage for all applicants related                       to the application form.

Automotive Cloud Fields on ApplicationFo.name: Automotive Cloud Fields on ApplicationFormProduct
Automotive Cloud Fields on ApplicationFo.description: Standard fields extend the ApplicationFormProduct object for use in          Automotive Cloud to represent the relationship between an application form product and a          deviation.

DownPayment.description: The downpayment amount an applicant wants to pay for the applicant                       form product.

PartnerVisibleStatus.description: Specifies the status of the application for a product that is                       submitted by the applicant as visible to a partner, such as a                       broker or a dealer.

RequestedMonthlyPayment.description: The monthly payment amount an applicant wants to pay for the                       applicant form product.

TotalBrandOwnedItemAmt.description: The total value of brand-owned seller items requested for                       financing.

TotalVendorOwnedItemAmt.description: The total value of vendor-owned seller items requested for                       financing.

Automotive Cloud Fields on ApplicationFo.name: Automotive Cloud Fields on ApplicationFormProductProposal
Automotive Cloud Fields on ApplicationFo.description: Standard fields extend the ApplicationFormProductProposal object for use in          Automotive Cloud to represent the terms attached to a scheme to sanction an automotive loan          or lease.

IsManualReviewRequired.description: Indicates whether manual review is required for the application                       form product proposal (true) or not (false).

ProposalGenerationMethod.description: Specifies the method in which the application form product                       proposal is generated, such as manual or automatic.

Automotive Cloud Fields on ApplicationFo.name: Automotive Cloud Fields on ApplicationFormSellerItem
Automotive Cloud Fields on ApplicationFo.description: Standard fields extend the ApplicationFormSellerItem object for use in          Automotive Cloud to represent a junction between an application form and an automotive          seller product.

AddlProductTermInMonths.description: The duration of the term in months for a seller item that's marked                       as an additional product related to an application form.

IntendedUse.description: Specifies the intention or purpose of use for a seller item                       related to an application form.

IsAdditionalProduct.description: Indicates whether a seller item related to an application product                       is an additional product (true), or not (false).

ItemCondition.description: Specifies the condition of a seller item related to an application                       form.

Automotive Cloud Fields on Asset.name: Automotive Cloud Fields on Asset
Automotive Cloud Fields on Asset.description: Standard fields extend the Asset object for use in Automotive Cloud to          represent information about each physical item that’s manufactured, installed, or sold,          such as a vehicle, a part like a car engine, or an accessory like car seat covers. Use the          VehicleId field on asset to represent an asset as a vehicle.

VehicleId.description: The vehicle associated with the asset. This field is available in                       API version 56.0 and later.

BusinessPartnerCode.description: The unique code that identifies the business partner. This field                       is available in API version 56.0 and later.

BusinessPartnerRegisteredName.description: The name of the business partner that’s registered as the legal                       name with the authorities. This field is available in API version                       56.0 and later.

BusinessPartnerType.description: Specifies the type of business partner and the role of the partner                       in relation to a vehicle. This field is available in API version                       56.0 and later.

ExternalReferenceNumber.description: The ID of the business partner that’s maintained on its source                       system. This field is unique within your organization. This field                       is available in API version 56.0 and later.

RegionName.description: Specifies the name of the region where the business partner                       operates from. This field is available in API version 56.0 and                       later.

ServiceType.description: Specifies the type of service provided by the business partner.                       This field is available in API version 56.0 and later.

Automotive Cloud Fields on InternalOrgan.name: Automotive Cloud Fields on InternalOrganizationUnit
Automotive Cloud Fields on InternalOrgan.description: Standard fields extend the InternalOrganizationUnit object for use in          Automotive Cloud to represent account structures or departments within a company.

AccountId.description: The account associated with this record.

Automotive Cloud Fields on Lead.name: Automotive Cloud Fields on Lead
Automotive Cloud Fields on Lead.description: Standard fields extend the Lead object for use in Automotive Cloud to          represent information about the time frame during which a lead is interested in a          transaction.

EarliestInterestDate.description: The earliest date from which the lead is interested in purchasing                       or selling the item. This field is available in API version 56.0                       and later.

LatestInterestDate.description: The latest date by which the lead is interested in purchasing or                       selling the item. This field is available in API version 56.0 and                       later.

Automotive Cloud Fields on Product2.name: Automotive Cloud Fields on Product2
Automotive Cloud Fields on Product2.description: Standard fields extend the Product2 object for use in Automotive Cloud to          represent information about vehicle models, parts, and accessories.

AvailabilityDate.description: The date when the part is used in the vehicle or is made available                       for sale. This field is available in API version 56.0 and                       later.

BusinessBrandId.description: The brand associated with this vehicle. This field is available in                       API version 56.0 and later.

DiscontinuedDate.description: The date from when the part can’t be used in the vehicle or sold.                       This field is available in API version 56.0 and later.

HarmonizedSystemCode.description: The harmonized system code that’s assigned to the vehicle or a part                       used in the vehicle. This field is available in API version 56.0                       and later.

HarmonizedTariffSchedCode.description: The harmonized tariff schedule code that’s assigned to the vehicle or                       a part used in the vehicle. This field is available in API version                       56.0 and later.

IsCertified.description: Indicates whether the part that’s installed as an accessory in the                       vehicle is certified (true) or not (false). This field is available                       in API version 56.0 and later.

IsEnvrPrtcRegCompliant.description: Indicates whether the product is compliant with the environment                       protection regulations or not. This field is available in API                       version 56.0 and later.

MakeName.description: Specifies the make name of the product. This field is available in                       API version 56.0 and later.

ManufacturerName.description: The manufacturer name for the part used in the vehicle. This field is                       available in API version 56.0 and later.

ManufacturerPartNumber.description: The unique number assigned by the manufacturer to identify the part.                       This field is available in API version 56.0 and later.

ModelName.description: Specifies the model name of the vehicle. This field is available                       in API version 56.0 and later.

ModelYear.description: The year when the model of the vehicle was first launched. This                       field is available in API version 56.0 and later.

ProductCategoryCode.description: The part category associated with the vehicle. This field is                       available in API version 56.0 and later.

ProductLineCode.description: The vehicle category associated with the part. This field is                       available in API version 56.0 and later.

UniversalProductCode.description: The universal product code used to track the part used in the                       vehicle. This field is available in API version 56.0 and                       later.

VehicleTrimLevel.description: The trim levels supported by the vehicle model. This field is                       available in API version 56.0 and later.

VersionName.description: The version name associated with the vehicle model. This field is                       available in API version 56.0 and later.

Claim.name: Claim
Claim.description: Represents a warranty Claim submitted by a partner to a manufacturer,          or a supplier recovery claim submitted by the manufacturer to a supplier.

AccountId.description: The ID of the account related to the claim.

ClaimReason.description: The reason for initiating the claim.

ClaimReasonType.description: The category to which the claim reason belongs.

ClaimType.description: Specifies the type of the claim.

ClaimTypeCode.description: Specifies the type code of the claim.

FinalizedDate.description: The date on which the claim was marked resolved, with claim status                       as approved or rejected.

FnolChannel.description: The channel through which the loss was reported.

IsClosed.description: Indicates whether the claim has been closed (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The claim number in the claims management system.

OwnerId.description: ID of the record owner.

RelatedClaimId.description: ID of the claim related to this claim.

TotalAdjustedAmount.description: The claim amount that was approved.

UsageType.description: The usage type of the Claims record.

ClaimCoverage.name: ClaimCoverage
ClaimCoverage.description: Represents a causal part in a defective asset that requires repair or          replacement.

AssetWarrantyId.description: The asset warranty ID of the defective asset in the associated                       claim item.

CausalPartId.description: The ID of the product part that causes the issues related to the                       claim.

ClaimId.description: The ID of the claim record associated with this claim                       coverage.

ClaimItemId.description: The ID of the claim item record associated with the claim                       coverage.

ClaimParticipantId.description: The ID of the claim participant record associated with this claim                       coverage.

Description.description: The description of the coverage for the claim.

ExtlWorkOrderReference.description: The external identifier of the work order.

FaultCodeId.description: The code ID that uniquely identifies the fault caused by the                       part.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the claim coverage.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

ProductRelatedMaterialId.description: The ID of the Product Related Material record that defines the                       association between the causal part and the product associated with                       the claim.

RelatedClaimCoverageId.description: The claim coverage against which the supplier recovery claim is                       created.

Status.description: The status of a claim coverage.

TotalAdjustedAmount.description: The total amount that's adjusted in a claim.

PartyRelationshipGroup.description: Represents a group of people living together such as a household, or a group          of people affiliated with each other.

AccountId.description: The parent account associated with the party relationship group.                       This field is unique within your organization.

Category.description: Specifies the category of the party relationship group.

Description.description: The description of the party relationship group.

EndDate.description: The end date associated with the party relationship group.

GroupIncome.description: The total income of the party relationship group.

GroupSize.description: The number of active members in the party relationship group.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LifetimeAcsryPurchaseValue.description: The total value of vehicle accessories purchased by all members in                       the party relationship group.

LifetimeSvcPurchaseCount.description: The total value of vehicle services purchased by all members in                       the party relationship group.

LifetimeVehPurchaseCount.description: The total count of vehicles purchased by all members in the party                       relationship group.

LifetimeVehPurchaseValue.description: The total value of vehicles purchased by all members in the party                       relationship group.

Name.description: Name of the party relationship group.

PrimaryAddress.description: The primary address of the party relationship group.

PrimaryCity.description: The primary city of the party relationship group.

PrimaryCountry.description: The primary country of the party relationship group.

PrimaryGeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates                       compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically                       provides this value based on the primary relationship group’s                       latitude and longitude coordinates.

PrimaryLatitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the                       party relationship group. Acceptable values are numbers between –90                       and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

PrimaryLongitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the party                       relationship group. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and                       180 with up to 15 decimal places.

PrimaryPostalCode.description: The primary postal code of the party relationship group.

PrimaryState.description: The primary state of the party relationship group.

PrimaryStreet.description: The primary street of the party relationship group.

StartDate.description: The start date associated with the party relationship group.

Status.description: The status of the party relationship group.

Subtype.description: Specifies the subclassification of the party relationship group                       type.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the party relationship group.

PartyRoleRelation.name: PartyRoleRelation
PartyRoleRelation.description: Represents information about the type of relationship between the          participants in a group or household.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view.

Name.description: Name of the party role relationship.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

RelatedInverseRecordId.description: The record that specifies the inverse relationship between the                       roles.

RelatedRoleName.description: The role that's related to another role in the relationship.

RelationshipObjectName.description: The object that's associated with the relationship.

RoleName.description: The name of the role in the relationship.

ShouldCreaInversRoleAuto.description: Indicates whether a role record should be created automatically                       for the relationship (true) or not (false).

ProductFaultCode.name: ProductFaultCode
ProductFaultCode.description: Represents a relationship between a product or product family and the          fault code.

FaultCodeId.description: The fault code associated with the product or product family.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record                       indirectly, for example, through a list view or related                       record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, and                          LastReferenceDate is not null, the user                       accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The auto-generated number for the name of the product fault                       code.

ProductFamily.description: The product family associated with the fault code.

ProductId.description: The ID of the product associated with the fault code.

ProductLaborCode.name: ProductLaborCode
ProductLaborCode.description: Represents a junction between the labor code that's applicable to a          product or product family and the required standard effort.

LaborCodeId.description: The labor code associated with the product or product family.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record                       indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, and                          LastReferenceDate is not null, the user                       accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The auto-generated number for the name of the product labor                       code.

ProductFamily.description: The product family associated with the labor code.

ProductWarrantyTerm.name: ProductWarrantyTerm
ProductWarrantyTerm.description: Defines the relationship between a product or product family and a          warranty term.

CoveredProductFamily.description: The product family that the warranty term applies to.

CoveredProductId.description: The ID of the product that the warranty term applies to.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the product warranty term was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the product warranty term was last viewed.

ProductWarrantyTermNumber.description: The identifier for this product warranty term.

WarrantyTermId.description: The ID of the associated warranty term.

RebateClaim.name: RebateClaim
RebateClaim.description: Represents proof of sale of a vehicle submitted by a dealer in the form of a          retail delivery report. This report can also be used for rebate payout calculations.

AssetId.description: The asset associated with the record.

AssetIdentificationNumber.description: The unique identifier of the associated vehicle or asset, such as                       a vehicle identification number or serial number of an                       accessory.

AssetSaleType.description: Specifies the type of sale that's associated with the rebate                       claim.

ClaimAmount.description: The amount claimed by the dealer.

ClaimDate.description: The date when the claim is submitted by the dealer.

ClaimedByAccountId.description: The account of the dealer who is submitting the claim.

ClaimedByAccountNumber.description: The reference number of the account of the dealer who is                       submitting the claim.

Description.description: The description of the claim.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Autogenerated unique identifier for the rebate claim record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the rebate claim record owner.

ParticipatingAccountId.description: The account of a participant in the claim. It can be the end                       customer or a partner.

ParticipatingAccountNumber.description: The reference number of the account of a participant in the                       claim.

ProcessingStatus.description: The processing status of the rebate claim.

ProcessingStatusMessage.description: The message with the details of the rebate claim’s processing                       status when it isn’t completed.

ProductCode.description: The reference number of the product for which the rebate claim is                       submitted.

ProductId.description: The product for which the rebate claim is submitted.

ProgramReferenceNumber.description: The reference number of the rebate program that the dealer is                       enrolled in.  Note Use this field if you have enabled Rebate                          Management in your org.

Quantity.description: The quantity of the product for which the rebate claim is                       submitted.

ReferencePricePerUnit.description: The price of a product unit that’s agreed upon between the                       manufacturer and the dealer or between the dealer and customer for                       the rebate claim.

ResalePricePerUnit.description: The price at which a unit of the product was bought by the                       customer.

SaleApprovalDate.description: The date on which the manufacturer approves the retail delivery                       report (RDR) of the dealer and acknowledges the sale of the                       vehicle.

SalePricePerUnit.description: The original price at which a product unit is sold to the dealer                       by the manufacturer.

TradedFromAccountId.description: The account of the dealer who sells a product to another dealer or                       distributor who further fulfills the final demand.

TradedToAccountId.description: The account of the dealer who purchases a product from another                       dealer or distributor to complete their inventory requirement.

VehicleDeliveryStatus.description: Specifies the delivery status of the associated vehicle.

VehicleDlvrOdometerReading.description: The odometer reading that’s taken at the time of vehicle                       delivery.

VehicleId.description: The vehicle associated with the rebate claim.

ServiceAppointment.name: ServiceAppointment
ServiceAppointment.description: Represents a service appointment booked through Automotive Scheduler, for          test drives or vehicle services.

ActualDuration.description: The number of minutes that it took the resource to complete the                       appointment. When values are first added to the Actual Start and                       Actual End fields, the Actual Duration is automatically populated                       to list the difference between the Actual Start and Actual End. If                       the Actual Start and Actual End fields are subsequently updated,                       the Actual Duration field doesn’t re-update, but you can manually                       update it.

ActualEndTime.description: The actual date and time the appointment ended.

ActualStartTime.description: The actual date and time the appointment started.

AdditionalInformation.description: Represents additional information about the service                       appointment.

Address.description: The address where the appointment is taking place.

AppointmentNumber.description: An auto-assigned number that identifies the appointment.

ArrivalWindowEndTime.description: The end of the window of time in which the technician is scheduled                       to arrive at the site.

ArrivalWindowStartTime.description: The beginning of the window of time in which the technician is                       scheduled to arrive at the site.

CancellationReason.description: The reason for the service appointment cancellation.

City.description: The city where the appointment is completed. Maximum length is 40                       characters.

Comments.description: The comments for the service appointment.

Country.description: The country where the appointment is completed. Maximum length is                       80 characters.

Description.description: The description of the appointment.

DueDate.description: The date by which the appointment must be completed.

Duration.description: The estimated length of the appointment as derived from the                       associated work type. The duration is in minutes or hours based on                       the value selected in the Duration Type field.

DurationType.description: The unit of duration as specified for the associated work                       type.

EarliestStartTime.description: The date after which the appointment must be completed.

GeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates                       compared with its physical address. Usually provided by a geocoding                       service based on the address’s latitude and longitude                       coordinates.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the service appointment was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the service appointment was last viewed.

Latitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the                       address where the service appointments is completed. Acceptable                       values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal                       places.

Longitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the                       address where the service appointment is completed. Acceptable                       values are numbers between –180 and 180 with up to 15 decimal                       places.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the appointment.

ParentRecordId.description: The parent record related to the appointment. The parent record                       can’t be updated after the service appointment is created. For test                       drive appointments, the parent record is a lead or an opportunity.                       For vehicle service appointments, theparent record is an asset                       that’s related to the vehicle.

ParentRecordType.description: (Read only) The type of parent record that provides context for                       the appointment, such as Asset, Lead, or Opportunity.

PostalCode.description: The postal code where the appointment is completed. Maximum length                       is 20 characters.

SchedEndTime.description: The time at which the appointment is scheduled to end.

SchedStartTime.description: The time at which the appointment is scheduled to start.

ServiceTerritoryId.description: The service territory associated with the appointment.

State.description: The state where the service appointment is completed. Maximum                       length is 80 characters.

Status.description: The status of the appointment. The picklist values can be                       customized.

StatusCategory.description: The category that each Status value falls into. The Status                       Category field’s values are identical to the default Status                       values.

Street.description: The street number and name where the service appointment is                       completed.

Subject.description: An autopopulated phrase describing the type of appointment, such                       as Test Drive Appointment or Vehicle Service Appointment.

WorkTypeId.description: The work type associated with the service appointment.

ServiceResourceSkill.name: ServiceResourceSkill
ServiceResourceSkill.description: Represents the association between a skill and a service resource.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date when the skill expires.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date from when a service resource is assigned the skill.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the resource skill was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the resource skill was last viewed.

ServiceResourceId.description: The service resource related to the record.

SkillId.description: The skill related to the record.

SkillLevel.description: The service resource’s skill level. Skill level can range from                       zero to 99.99.

SkillNumber.description: An autogenerated number identifying the resource skill                       assignment.

ServiceTerritory.name: ServiceTerritory
ServiceTerritory.description: Represents a dealer location where  service  resources are located and          service appointments are performed.

Address.description: An address to associate with a dealer’s location.

City.description: The city of the associated address. The Automotive appointment                       booking flows for test drives and vehicle services use the dealer                       name or city name as search input for the appointment location.                       Maximum length is 40 characters.

Country.description: The country to associate with the territory. Maximum length is 80                       characters.

Description.description: The description of the territory.

GeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates                       compared with its physical address. Usually provided by a geocoding                       service based on the address’s latitude and longitude                       coordinates.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the service territory is meant to be used (true)                       or not (false). If a territory is inactive, you can’t add members                       to it or link it to service appointments.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the record was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

Latitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the                       address where the service appointments is completed. Acceptable                       values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal                       places.

Longitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the                       address where the service appointment is completed. Acceptable                       values are numbers between –180 and 180 with up to 15 decimal                       places.

Name.description: The name of a dealer location. The Automotive appointment booking                       flows for test drives and vehicle services use the dealer name or                       city name as search input for the appointment location.

OperatingHoursId.description: The territory’s operating hours, which indicate when service                       appointments within the territory can occur. Service resources who                       are members of a territory  and  work types related to a territory                       automatically inherit the territory’s operating hours unless                       different hours are specified on the resource or the work type                       record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record.

ParentTerritoryId.description: The territory’s parent service territory, if it has one. A service                       territory hierarchy can contain up to 10,000 territories.

PostalCode.description: The postal code of the address associated with the territory.                       Maximum length is 20 characters.

State.description: The state of the address associated with the territory.  Maximum                       length is 80 characters.

Street.description: The street number and name of the address associated with the                       territory.

ServiceTerritoryMember.name: ServiceTerritoryMember
ServiceTerritoryMember.description: Represents a service resource who can be assigned to an  appointment in a          service territory.

City.description: The city of the member’s address. Maximum length is 40                       characters.

Country.description: The country of the member’s address. Maximum length is 80                       characters.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date when the service resource is no longer a member of the                       territory.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date when the service resource becomes a member of the service                       territory.

GeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates                       compared with its physical address. Usually provided by a geocoding                       service based on the address’s latitude and longitude                       coordinates.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the territory member was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the territory member was last viewed.

Latitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the                       member’s address. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90                       with up to 15 decimal places.

Longitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the                       member’s address. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and                       180 with up to 15 decimal places.

MemberNumber.description: (Read only) An auto-generated number identifying the service                       territory member.

OperatingHoursId.description: The operating hours assigned to the service territory member. If                       no operating hours are specified, the member is assumed to use                       their parent service territory’s operating hours. If a member needs                       special operating hours, create them in Setup and select them in                       the Operating Hours lookup field on the member’s detail page.

PostalCode.description: The postal code of the member’s address. Maximum length is 20                       characters.

ServiceResourceId.description: The service resource assigned to the service territory.

ServiceTerritoryId.description: The service territory that the service resource is assigned                       to.

State.description: The state of the member’s address. Maximum length is 80                       characters.

Street.description: The street number and name of the member’s address.

TerritoryType.description: Specifies the type of the territory in relation to the resource                       who is a member.

Skill.name: Skill
Skill.description: Represents a skill that service resources have. For technician type service          resources, the skill represents their area of expertise. For asset type service resources,          the skill must be specified as Test Drive.

Description.description: The description of the skill.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the object in the API. This name can contain                       only underscores and alphanumeric characters, and must be unique in                       your org. It must begin with a letter, not include spaces, not end                       with an underscore, and not contain two consecutive                       underscores.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

SkillRequirement.name: SkillRequirement
SkillRequirement.description: Represents a skill that is required to complete a particular work type.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                       record.

RelatedRecordId.description: The record that the skill is required for. The related record is a                       work type in Automotive Cloud.

SkillLevel.description: he level of the skill required. Skill levels can range from zero                       to 99.99.

SkillNumber.description: An auto-generated number identifying the skill requirement.

TelemetryActionDefinition.name: TelemetryActionDefinition
TelemetryActionDefinition.description: Represents the action taken on a telemetry signal sent from a connected asset or    vehicle, such as getting the current status of a vehicle or its component, or sending a request    to perform a remote action on the vehicle or its component.

ActionName.description: The full name of the action related to a telemetry definition.

Description.description: The description of the telemetry action definition.

ExecutionProcedureIdentifier.description: The unique identifier for the execution procedure that completes the telemetry action related processes.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the action is active (true) or not (false).

TelemetryDefinitionVersionId.description: The telemetry definition version related to the action.

TelemetryActionDefStep.name: TelemetryActionDefStep
TelemetryActionDefStep.description: Represents a step in the action for a telemetry signal definition.

GroupName.description: The name of the group that the telemetry action definition step belongs to. Steps in a group are shown together in an intake form.

OperationType.description: Specifies the type of the operation that's performed in the telemetry action definition step.

RemoteEndPointUrl.description: The URL of the remote end point to which a request is shared to execute the telemetry action step.

SequenceNumber.description: The sequence number of a step in the action related to a telemetry definition.

TargetComponentPath.description: The hierarchical path representing the target component in the telemetry system of a connected asset or vehicle where the action is targeted.

TelemetryActionDefinitionId.description: The telemetry action definition related to the step.

TelemetryActionRelatedProcess.name: TelemetryActionRelatedProcess
TelemetryActionRelatedProcess.description: Represents the relationship between a telemetry action and a process          triggered by the action such as a service catalog item definition or a product.

Name.description: The name of the telemetry action related process.

RelatedProcessId.description: The process triggered by the action defined for a telemetry                       definition.

TelemetryActionDefinitionId.description: The action related to a telemetry definition.

TelemetryActnDefStepAttr.name: TelemetryActnDefStepAttr
TelemetryActnDefStepAttr.description: Represents the attributes of a telemetry action definition step.

AllowedValues.description: The allowed values for the telemetry action definition step                       attribute.

AttributeName.description: The name of the telemetry action definition step attribute.

DataType.description: The data type of the telemetry action definition step                       attribute.

Description.description: The description of the telemetry action definition step                       attribute.

DeveloperName.description: The name of the telemetry action definition step attribute.

MaximumValue.description: The maximum value allowed for the telemetry action definition step                       attribute.

MinimumValue.description: The minimum value allowed for the telemetry action definition step                       attribute.

TelemetryActnDefStepId.description: The telemetry action definition step that this attribute belongs                       to.

Type.description: The type of the telemetry action definition step attribute.

UnitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure of the telemetry action definition step                       attribute.

TelemetryDefinition.name: TelemetryDefinition
TelemetryDefinition.description: Represents the definition of the structure of a telemetry signal sent from a          connected asset or vehicle.

Description.description: The description of the telemetry definition.

IsTemplate.description: Indicates whether the telemetry definition is a template (true) or                       not (false).

LatestVersionId.description: The latest version of the telemetry definition. The telemetry                       definition version with the highest version number is the                       latest.

UsageType.description: The usage type of the telemetry definition.

TelemetryDefinitionVersion.name: TelemetryDefinitionVersion
TelemetryDefinitionVersion.description: Represents a version of the structure of a telemetry signal sent from a          connected asset or vehicle.

Description.description: The description of the telemetry definition version.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the telemetry definition version is active                       (true) or not (false).

TelemetryComponentStructure.description: The structure of the components in the telemetry definition that                       send signals, represented in a JSON format.

TelemetryDefinitionId.description: The telemetry definition that's associated with the telemetry                       definition version.

VersionNumber.description: The version number of the telemetry definition version.

TimeSlot.name: TimeSlot
TimeSlot.description: Represents a period of time on a specified day of the week during which an          appointment can be scheduled.

DayOfWeek.description: The day of the week when the time slot takes place.

EndTime.description: The time when the time slot ends.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                       record.

MaxAppointments.description: Maximum number of appointments for a single time slot.

OperatingHoursId.description: The operating hours that the time slot belongs to. An operating                       hours’ time slots appear in the Operating Hours related list.

StartTime.description: The time when the time slot starts.

TimeSlotNumber.description: The name of the time slot. The name is auto-populated to a day and                       time format—for example, Monday 9:00 AM - 10:00 PM—but you can                       manually update it.

WorkTypeGroupId.description: Work type group assigned to the time slot.

TransactionJournal.name: TransactionJournal

AccountId.description: The dealer account associated with the record.

ErrorDescription.description: The description of the error in the journal record.

ExternalTransactionNumber.description: The transaction number from the external systems.

InvoiceDate.description: The date the invoice was generated.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

MemberId.description: The rebate program member associated with this record.  Note Use                          this field if you have enabled Rebate Management in your org and                          the dealer submitting the transaction is part of a rebate                          program.

Name.description: Autogenerated unique identifier of the transaction journal                       record.

OrderId.description: The order associated with the transaction.

OrderItemId.description: The order items associated with the transaction.

ProductCategoryId.description: The category of the product associated with the transaction.

ProductId.description: The product associated with the transaction.

Quantity.description: The product quantity associated with the transaction.

QuantityUnitOfMeasureId.description: The unit of measure associated with the record.

RebatePgmReferenceNumber.description: The reference number of the rebate program in which the dealer is                          enrolled.  Note Use this field if you have enabled Rebate                          Management in your org and the dealer submitting the transaction                          is part of a rebate program.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The record of an asset or vehicle that's associated with this                       transaction.

ShipToAccountId.description: The customer or partner account associated with the                       transaction.

TradedFromAccountId.description: The account of the dealer who sells a product to another dealer or                       distributor who further fulfills the final demand.

TradedToAccountId.description: The account of the dealer who purchases a product from another                       dealer or distributor to complete their inventory requirement.

TransactionAmount.description: The total amount of the transaction.

BodyType.description: The body type or style of the vehicle, such as hatchback, SUV, or                       coupe.

BusinessBrandId.description: The ID of a Business Brand record related to a vehicle model.

BusinessBrandName.description: The name of the business brand related to a vehicle model.

DoorCount.description: The number of doors in the vehicle model, such as 2 or 4.

DoorStyle.description: The door style of the vehicle.

DrivetrainSystem.description: The drivetrain system implemented in the vehicle.

EmissionStandard.description: The emission standard applicable to the vehicle, such as EURO 5,                       or LEV.

EngineCapacity.description: The engine capacity of the vehicle model, such as 1900 cc.

FuelSource.description: The power source used in the vehicle.

GeoCountryId.description: The Geo Country code associated with the specific vehicle model                       and variant.

GeoCountryName.description: The country associated with the specific vehicle model and                       variant.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the associated location was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the associated location was last viewed.

ListPrice.description: The price of the vehicle definition configured in the price book                       entry.

MainBatteryType.description: The type of battery used in the vehicle, such as Lithium Ion, or                       gel cell battery (Dry Cell).

MakeName.description: The make name of a vehicle.

ModelName.description: The model name of a vehicle.

ModelVersionName.description: The version name associated with the vehicle model.

ModelYear.description: The model year of a vehicle.

Name.description: The name of the vehicle definition searchable field.

OwnerId.description: The owner ID of the vehicle definition searchable field.

PriceBookEntryId.description: The ID of the Price Book Entry record related to the product.

ProductCode.description: The unique code of a Product record related to the vehicle                       model.

ProductFamily.description: The product family to which a vehicle belongs.

ProductId.description: The ID of the Product record related to a vehicle defintion.

ProductImageUrl.description: The URL to the image of a product.

TopSpeed.description: The highest speed the vehicle model can achieve.

TransmissionSystem.description: The transmission type of the vehicle.

TrimType.description: The trim type of the vehicle model, such as DX, GT,or LS.

UniversalProductCode.description: The universal product code used to track the part used in the                       product.

VariantName.description: The variant of a specific vehicle, such as LS or XD.

VehicleClass.description: The classification or category of the vehicle such as sport,                       utility, or sedan.

VehicleDefinitionId.description: The ID of the Vehicle Definition record.

VehicleDefinitionName.description: The name of the vehicle definition related to a vehicle.

ActiveRecallCount.description: The number of active recalls for parts related to the                       vehicle.

ActiveServiceContractCount.description: The number of active service contracts for the vehicle.

ActiveSubscriptionCount.description: The number of active subscriptions for the vehicle.

ActiveWarrantyCount.description: The number of active warranties for the vehicle.

AssetId.description: The asset associated with the vehicle. This field is unique within                       your organization.

AverageMarketValue.description: The average market value of the vehicle.

ChassisNumber.description: The chassis number that is unique to the vehicle.

Classification.description: Auto-populated based on the vehicle classification specified on                       the related vehicle definition.

ConditionType.description: Specifies the current status of the vehicle.

CurrentOwnerId.description: The current owner of the vehicle.

CylinderCount.description: The number of cylinders in the engine of the vehicle.

DrivetrainSystem.description: Auto-populated based on the drivetrain system specified on the                       related vehicle definition.

EngineName.description: Auto-populated based on the engine name specified on the related                       vehicle definition.

EngineNumber.description: The engine number of the vehicle.

ExteriorColor.description: The exterior color of the vehicle.

FrontRimSize.description: The rim size of the front wheel of the vehicle.

FrontTireSize.description: The size of the front tire of the vehicle.

FuelSource.description: Auto-populated based on the fuel source specified on the related                       vehicle definition.

GearBoxType.description: The gear box type for the vehicle.

HeadUnitName.description: The head unit of the vehicle.

HeadUnitSecurityCode.description: The anti-theft code or security code that unlocks the head unit of                       a car. If the factory car stereo is stolen from the vehicle, the                       head unit becomes inoperable without this code.

HighestMarketValue.description: The highest market value of the vehicle.

InteriorColor.description: The interior color of the vehicle.

IsConnectedServiceActive.description: Indicates whether connected services for a vehicle are active                       (true) or not (false).

IsRecallOpen.description: Indicate whether a recall is required for the vehicle.

IsTelematicsServiceActive.description: Indicates whether the vehicle has any subscription to Telematics                       Services or not. Telematics services collect key performance data                       related to a vehicle.

LastOdometerReading.description: The last odometer reading that was recorded for the vehicle.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastServiceDate.description: The date when the vehicle was last serviced.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LatestResidualValue.description: The date when the residual value is calculated.

LatestResidualValueDate.description: The current location of the vehicle.

Location.description: The city where the vehicle is located.

LocationCity.description: The country where the vehicle is located.
